text: Pasqual Maragall i Mira (; born 13 January 1941) is a Spanish politician. He was President of the Government of Catalonia from 2003 to 2006. He was Mayor of Barcelona from 1982 to 1997. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:People with Alzheimer's disease Category:Presidents of the Government of Catalonia Category:Mayors of Barcelona
title: Pasqual Maragall
